content.body: I wish minifiers all published their full list of assumed language axioms
content.formatted_body: I wish minifiers all published their full list of assumed language axioms

content.body: I also wish https://shift-ast.org/ had become the defacto AST for JS tooling instead of ESTree.

**_Reminder:_** If you wish to present at JSConf.jp on Sunday 16th November, the CFP deadline is today! (Sunday 31st August)

The panel will be dealt with separately.

content.body: And reminder that it's already 7pm in Japan, so "today" ends in just 5 hours
